plugin.name: Plugin Permissions
plugin.author: Andreas Jacob (http://cordobo.com/)
plugin.description: Cordova / PhoneGap Plugin Permission Settings for NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription, NSHealthShareUsageDescription, NSCameraUsageDescription, NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription, NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription and NSMicrophoneUsageDescription in iOS 11 by adding a declaration to the Info.plist file
plugin.keywords: cordova, ios, app, security, permissions, nscamerausagedescription, nsphotolibraryaddusagedescription, nsphotolibraryusagedescription, nsmicrophoneusagedescription

preference.name: PHOTOLIBRARY_USAGE_DESCRIPTION
preference.default: This app needs read/write-access photo library access

preference.name: HEALTH_READ_PERMISSION
preference.default: This app needs read/write-access to Healthkit

preference.name: HEALTH_WRITE_PERMISSION
preference.default: This app needs read/write-access to Healthkit
